actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.
Reported to House from the Committee on Appropriations, H. Rept. 94-1029.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of budget authority relating to special supplemental food program (WIC) (deferral D76-105) which is proposed by the President in his message of March 18, 1976, transmitted under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Disapproves of proposed budget deferral D76-105 as set forth in the President's message of March 18, 1976, relating to the Department of Agriculture, Food and Nutrition Service, special supplemental food program (WIC).

titles.title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of budget authority relating to special supplemental food program (WIC) (deferral D76-105) which is proposed by the President in his message of March 18, 1976, transmitted under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
